description: Commander Brackets v1 - DragonsVault ruleset aligned with Wizards Oct 2025 update

1.label: Bracket 1
1.description: Low interaction, minimal engines, casual gameplay

2.label: Bracket 2
2.description: Some card advantage and interaction, slower engines

3.label: Bracket 3
3.description: Multiple engines, meaningful interaction, consistent threats

4.label: Bracket 4
4.description: Fast engines, strong consistency, high-impact plays

5.label: Bracket 5
5.description: Game-warping effects, early or inevitable wins

mana_base_optimization.label: Optimized Mana Base
mana_base_optimization.description: High non-basic land count improves consistency but does not independently raise bracket

tutors.label: Tutors
tutors.description: Tutors are tracked and displayed but do not escalate bracket placement

bracket5_confidence.description: Bracket 5 requires multiple strong signals and is not assigned by a single metric

notes: Bracket calculation is based on card identity and known interactions
Deck synergies and player intent are not inferred
Tutor presence does not force bracket escalation
Ruleset is versioned to support future Commander Bracket updates
